# nios_dhcp_optiondefinition (Data Source)

Retrieves information about existing DHCP Option Definitions.

## Example Usage

```terraform
// Retrieve a specific DHCP Option Definition by filters
data "nios_dhcp_optiondefinition" "get_dhcp_option_definition_using_filters" {
  filters = {
    name  = "example_option_definition"
    space = "example_option_space"
  }
}

// Retrieve all IPv6 DHCP Option Definitions
data "nios_dhcp_optiondefinition" "get_all_dhcp_option_definitions" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `filters` (Map of String) Filter are used to return a more specific list of results. Filters can be used to match resources by specific attributes, e.g. name. If you specify multiple filters, the results returned will have only resources that match all the specified filters.
- `max_results` (Number) Maximum number of objects to be returned. Defaults to 1000.
- `paging` (Number) Enable (1) or disable (0) paging for the data source query. When enabled, the system retrieves results in pages, allowing efficient handling of large result sets. Paging is enabled by default.

### Read-Only

- `result` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--result))

<a id="nestedatt--result"></a>
### Nested Schema for `result`

Required:

- `code` (Number) The code of a DHCP option definition object. An option code number is used to identify the DHCP option.
- `name` (String) The name of a DHCP option definition object.
- `type` (String) The data type of the Grid DHCP option.

Optional:

- `space` (String) The space of a DHCP option definition object.

Read-Only:

- `ref` (String) The reference to the object.
